1.content:
In the village of Konaha, a year has passed since Naruto left on his training trip. Hinata Hyuga is watching Naruto's apartment.

'I miss Naruto,' Hinata thinks.

While reminiscing Hinata sees the color red passing by the inside of Naruto's window. Hinata uses her byakugan, and is shocked to see a red haired women crying in Naruto's bedroom. Hinata sneaks into Naruto's apartment, and gets a better look of the women. The women had long red hair, deep plum eyes, and she is wearing a green dress. Hinata is shocked to see her fade in, and out, before realizing that she must be a spirit.

"What are you doing here," Hinata stuttered. The woman looks at her before saying, “I’m missing my son."

Hinata is wondering what she means when it came to her. "Are you Naruto's mother," Hinata said. The women smiled at her before saying" My name is Kushina Uzumaki".

"How are you here," Hinata asks. Kushina explains her past to Hinata including Naruto's heritage, and burden. Upon seeing Hinata not care about Naruto’s burden or heritage, Kushina explains how she used a jutsu to bring her soul back, however it takes years for her soul to return, and it only lasts six months.

"And my son want return for a least a year," Kushina finishes. “Why don't you look for Naruto," Hinata says with tears running down her eyes. "It's one of the flaws of the jutsu. You can only be seen by the first person to see you," Kushina says

Hinata starts crying as she learned she stole Naruto's one chance to see his mother. "Is there anything I can do to help," Hinata asks.

Kushina looks shocked, before a smirk appears on her face. “Yes there is something you can do," Kushina says. Before Hinata can ask what, Kushina runs into her, and Hinata passes out.

Hinata wakes up in her room, and wonders if it was all a dream. This thought is squashed when her wall flickers, and is replaced by a smiling image of Kushina. "What’s going on," Hinata asks.

"You are in your mind," Kushina says." I have possessed your body to help me."

"What are you going to do," Hinata asks.

"I have a special justu that I plan to use to make Naruto's life easier," Kushina says.

"I don't know," Hinata says. She sees Kushina frown before looking into her eyes.

Hinata blinks before trying to remember what was going on. She remembers that she agreed to help Kushina. She turns to her wall to see the world from her body’s eyes.

Kushina is walking down the street in Hinata's body wearing a smirk never before seen on this face. She enters the Hokage tower, and makes her way to Minato's office. "Tsunade's office," She mentally corrected herself. She sees Tsunade drinking, and thinks about what a poor excuse of a Hokage Tsunade is. Her son could do much better. "In fact," Kushina thinks making some revisions to her plan.

"What do you want," Tsunade asks. "There is something strange going on with my byakugan," Kushina says with no hint of a stutter. Tsunade looks into Kushina's eyes not noticing her making hand signs. "Uzugan!" Kushina says with a smile. Tsunade sees swirls appear in Kushina's eyes, and feels her mind go blank.

Kushina smiles at her plan. The Uzugan has the power to brainwash others, it was used to turn Uzushiogakure missing ninjas into loyal shinobis. Kushina begins the next step in her plan. "Naruto is the Hokage in all but name. You are simply holding the title till the rest of the village is ready to accept it. Because Naruto is Hokage, as a leaf ninja you do whatever he tells you to do. You will never drink or gamble again. They are distracting you from making sure the village is perfect for when Naruto gains the title," Kushina says. Kushina next looks into her mind to start the final part of her plan.

Hinata is confused about what Kushina is doing, but knows she must always help Mistress Kushina. Ignoring the last part of her thought, Hinata looks at the wall to see Kushina. She looks into Kushina's eyes before feeling her mind go blank.

Kushina smiles. Her plan after seeing that Hinata cared about her son was to slowly make her into Naruto perfect girlfriend. She could also remember how good Hinata's mother was in bed, during the days in Minato's Harem. She was like a docile little kitten to Minato. Of course she always remembered that if she was bad she would have a visit from Mistress Kushina's whip. After wiping away a nose bleed, Kushina creates a loop, and heads back to Tsunade. Hinata spends the rest of the justu learning how much she loves Naruto.

Kushina checks the clock before talking to Tsunade again. “As Hokage Naruto owns you Heart, Body, and Soul. You spend any time off fantasizing about obeying Naruto. Every time you do something good for Naruto you will get horny. You will not try to get further with Naruto then being his servant, and sextoy," Kushina says. Feeling that that was good Kushina ordered Tsunade to forget her coming here, and left turning off the justu.

Hinata wakes up, and asks Kushina what they were going to do next. "Make Naruto's life even better," Kushina says, many fantasies going around her head.

One hour later, Shizune comes into Tsunade's office to find her happily working on paperwork. "You seem happy Lady Tsunade," Shizune says.

"I found a new lease on life," Tsunade says. When Shizune leaves, Tsunade starts joyfully thinking about the return of Lord Hokage.

Kurenai never stood a chance. She stood dumbly, still, her mind and eyes blank.

152.content:
Kushina saw two women leaving the dango shop that was right across the street from the Ramen shop. One had purple hair done up in a spiky ponytail, with pupiless brown eyes. The other woman had black hair and red eyes.

The woman with the purple hair dressed very provocativly. She wore only a brown half coat, with just fishnet underneath. She also wore a short skirt that was just long enough to be considered decent.

The black haired one wore a dress that was made of red and white bandages, and went down to just above the knee.

Looking into Hinata's momries, Kushina saw that these two were Anko and Kurenai, respectivly. Seeing how Anko scared her son, Kushia got in a huff. Oh yeah, Anko was going to go down hard. Kurenai on the other hand, was sweet and caring. She would be able to teach Hinata anything that Kushina couldn't about being a good girlfriend and wife.

So, decision in mind, Kushina made her way up to the two of them. "Kurenai-sensei." She said, getting the woman's attention.

"Oh. Hello Hinata. How are you? I know that Naruto's trip still has you down, but he'll be okay. He has Jiraiya with him after all." The kind woman said, making Anko laugh slightly.

"Yeah, I doubt it. If I know Jiraiya, and I do from past expeience, he won't teach the kid anything. He will just give the kid something to do while he goes peeping on women. That kid shouldn't even be a shinobi as far as I am concerned. He was a loud mouthed idiot during the chunin exams, and he was up until he left."

Kushina, meanwhile was fuming. How dare this woman berate her son. She knew from Hinata's memories of him that Naruto was a loud, hyper active kid. But, he was nowhere near her level when she was a kid. She was at least four times as obnoxious he was!

Still, not showing this on Hinata's face, she pulled the 'I have something I want to talk about, but I don't want it to be public look' on her face.

Kurenai, noticing that look, smiled at the girl. "Well, why don't you come over to my place. My and Anko were just heading over there anyway. I think we all need to relax." She said, making Kushina smirk. It would be perfect.

~Twenty minutes later~

Kurenai closed the door to her appartment, not knowing the scheme that was brewing just behind her in the form of Hinata.

"I know that look Hinata." Kurenai said. "Now, what did you want to talk about?"

However, once Kushina had both women in her sights, she flashed through hand seals and shouted "Uzugan!"

Both women gained blank looks in their eyes.

"Listen well. You two know that Naruto is the true hokage. However, you both know that the people in the village won't accept that quite yet. So, you both keep quiet about it. Now, Kurenai. You are to teach Hinata everything about being a good girl friend and wife. You are to teach her how to cook, how to clean, and how to please a man. Understood?"

"Yes mistress." Kurenai droned.

Looking back over to Anko, Kushina gave the woman a scowl. "And you, Anko. You are to teach Hinata about how to be controling. You will teach her how to punish slaves that do not do as they are told. You will also teach her how to interrogate some one with just mental tourtue. Then when you think she is dominate enough, you will submit to her as your mistress. Clear?"

"Clear." Anko said, sounding as monotone as Kurenai.

"Good. Now, when I stop the Uzugan, You will forget me even being her. You will forget running into Hinata on the streets, and you will think that you came right back home after finishing your meal to fantasize about Naruto, and how much it would please you both to have him dominate you. Remeber, he owns you in mind, body and soul."

"Yes mistress. " They both monotoned.

Kushina is walking around the village after brainwashing Shizune, and feels a familiar itch that needs scratching.

‘Now who to use,’ Kushina thinks. She starts looking through Hinata’s memories, until she finds something she likes. ‘Jackpot!’ Kushina thinks when she finds out about Ino, and Sakura. Those girls dared to think her son was a loser. ‘Oh their going down,’ Kushina thinks while looking for them.

Kushina finds them at a clothing store. She comes up to them, while undressing them with her eyes. “Can I talk to you somewhere private,” Kushina asks. “Not now we’re busy,” Ino and Sakura says. Kushina looks at the other people in the store. One of the down sides of the Uzugan is that the subject will take in All suggestions, not just the ones said by the user. But Kushina has a backup plan.

“Silver Tongue Jutsu,” Kushina whispers, as her tongue turns silver. Thus jutsu is much weaker than the Uzugan. While it lets you control people, the effects only last while chakra is in the users tongue. “Why don’t you two take me to Sakura’s house,” Kushina says. They are about to refuse when their minds go blank. They are now puppets with one command. To take Hinata to Sakura’s house. They pick up Hinata, and carry her to Sakura’s.

At Sakura’s house Kushina is put down, and starts doing hand signs. When the jutsu wore off, Sakura, and Ino only had a second to wonder what was going on, before they saw the Uzugan. Kushina then went into Hinata’s mind to start the next stage of her plan.

Kushina gets Hinata’s attention by saying something “special”. “Hinata,” Kushina says. “Mistress Kushina needs her student.” Hinata wonders what she was talking about, when she is engulfed in a light. Now Hinata is nude. Her nipples are pointing straight out, and a whip is in her hand. To further prove this is not the real Hinata, a look of pure lust is brightly shown on her face. “Slutty Student Hina is fucking ready to learn,” the one called Hina says. Hina is an alternate personality made by combining a moral less Hinata, with Kushina’s confidence. Everything Hina does is only known as a dream to Hinata. However it does not stop her from learning things.

“Today you’re going to learn how to make some playthings for when my son is away,” Kushina says. Kushina leaves as Hina sticks a dildo shaped like Naruto’s dick, made by memory, into her pussy.

Kushina turns to the girls. “So I hear you like the Uchiha prick,” Kushina says. “Well we can’t have that. Take off your clothes!” The girls do it without a single thought in their head. “Look at each other’s tits.” Kushina commands. “These are much better than the Uchiha’s chest. and gave then a hunger for the same sex.

“Now look here,” Kushina says, as she removes Hinata’s clothes. “Look at my feet, so beautiful you should bow your head to the ground in worship. My ass, so hot you want to kiss it. My tits, so great your nipples get hard just looking at them. My face, the envy of all women. And finally my pussy, so magnificent you need a poet to come up with how to describe it. My body looks like a gift from a goddess,” Kushina finishes.

Sakura and Ino’s heads are filling up. Their concept of beauty is now Hinata. However now it’s time to add more. “Yes my body is the gift of a goddess,” Kushina says. “However, Naruto is the god himself. His body is perfection given human form. He is stronger then all the tailed beasts combined. You do not simply like him. You worship him as your god. When he comes back to Konaha, You will praise him for his every action. He is your ruler, and as his future wife I am your queen,” Kushina finishes.

Kushina enters Hinata’s mind, only to find Hina passed out. She smiles like a proud mother, and whispers the trigger phrase to bring back Hinata, before leaving. Kushina
returns to find Sakura, and Ino bowing at her feet. “I have a fun idea,” Kushina says. “What mistress Hinata,” Ino, and Sakura say. “You should go find Anko, and have her tattoo praise for Naruto all over your body. You should pay her by being her sex slave for the rest of the day,” Kushina says. Before Kushina could say anything else,
Ino and Sakura had said it was a great idea, and ran off. Kushina is angry they left her with an itch that had gotten worse.

Kushina looks around Sakura’s house, and saw a picture that filled her with rage. “Mebuki,” Kushina growled. Mebuki was the only female ninja in the village who refused to be in Minato’s Harem. “And now she doesn’t help my son get Sakura into his Harem,” Oh Kushina is pissed.

153.content:
After using the Uzugan to indoctrinate Ayame, Kushina in Hinata's body decided to head to the training grounds. With a quick series of body flickers she leaped across the rooftops and headed to one of the many forested areas ubiquitous to the Hidden Leaf.

The trip didn't take more than a minute at the most, and when Kushina got there she spotted something interesting. A young woman, probably only a year or so older than her son, was throwing kunai at practice targets. This in and of itself was not at all extraordinary, but the accuracy and precision with which the girl threw the weapons belied an astounding level of skill in shurikenjutsu. Every knife she threw hit the dead-center of its target, and penetrated surprisingly deep for tools that were not augmented by chakra manipulation.

Furthermore, the girl in question was rather cute, in an unassuming sort of way. She wouldn't exactly be turning heads everywhere she went, but she had a nice enough body to attract a few furtive glances here and there, and she was certainly attractive in her own fashion.

Briefly sifting through Hinata's memories, Kushina managed to put a name to the face -- Tenten, of Team Guy (and the thought that Guy of all people had been entrusted with a genin squad sent a small shiver up her spine), a kunoichi of no small skill, who was apparently considered one of the best to ever graduate from the Academy.

A smile found its way onto her face at this. It looked like she had found a suitable bodyguard for her son, and so quickly, too!

Leaping down from the trees, Kushina narrowly managed to avoid being pegged by a salvo of menacingly sharp shuriken, which instead wound up planting themselves in the tree behind her.

"Hinata!" Tenten exclaimed, eyes wide. "Oh geez, I'm sorry!" she said, running up to Kushina and inspecting her vessel's body. After a moment of this and spotting no obvious cuts, the brunette let out a relieved sigh. "Lucky..." she muttered, before smiling nervously.

"You really startled me, Hinata," said Tenten, before giving a conspiratorial grin. "But then I suppose you've had a lot of practice, haven't you? Sneaking around, I mean. Let's hope Naruto is a little less oblivious when he comes back from his, eh?" She chuckled. "He's not really my type, but it's not hard for me to imagine why you'd be so into him, you know?"

Kushina smiled inwardly. This girl clearly had a good head on her shoulders, in her completely unbiased opinion. And judging by her skill with handling weapons, she could probably make a decent bodyguard for her son when he returned -- not that he would need one, if Jiraiya did half as good a job with the boy as he did with Minato, but it was the thought that counted.

"I know," she said with a vulpine grin, and her eyes began to swirl as she whispered "Uzugan." Instantly Tenten was ensnared by the doujutsu, and Kushina quickly educated her on her role: she was to serve as a bodyguard of Naruto, the true hokage as she was instructed, and she admired and adored him, and served him unquestioningly in all matters from the martial to the sexual.

Once that was done, Kushina...
